sources.name: CPU Usage
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.usage_rate", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Usage")/1000

sources.name: Memory Usage
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.usage", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Usage")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: CPU Request
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.request", cluster="${cluster_name}"  and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Request")/1000

sources.name: Memory Request
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.request", cluster="${cluster_name}"  and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Request")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: CPU Limit
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.limit", cluster="${cluster_name}"  and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Limit")/1000

sources.name: Memory Limit
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.limit", cluster="${cluster_name}"  and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Limit")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: A
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Usage}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Usage}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Usage Cost per month ($)')

sources.name: A Clone
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Request}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Request}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Request Cost per month ($)')

sources.name: A Clone 2
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Limit}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Limit}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Limit Cost per month ($)')

charts.name: PODs Cost Breakdown

sources.name: cpu_used
sources.query: max(ts("kubernetes.pod.cpu.usage_rate", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and type="pod"), sources, pod_name).gt(0)

sources.name: memory_used
sources.query: max(ts("kubernetes.pod.memory.usage", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and type="pod"), sources, pod_name).gt(0)

sources.name: cpu_request
sources.query: max(ts("kubernetes.pod.cpu.request", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and type="pod"), sources, pod_name).gt(0)

sources.name: memory_request
sources.query: max(ts("kubernetes.pod.memory.request", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and type="pod"), sources, pod_name).gt(0)

sources.name: cpu
sources.query:
join(
${cpu_used} AS ts1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ${${_cpu_cost_basis}} AS ts2 USING(source, pod_name),
  metric='${_cpu_cost_basis} (Cores)', pod_name=ts1.pod_name, source=ts2.source,
  (ts2 / 1000 ) 
  )

sources.name: memory
sources.query:
join(
${memory_used} AS ts1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ${${_memory_cost_basis}} AS ts2 USING(source, pod_name),
  metric='${_memory_cost_basis} (GB)', pod_name=ts1.pod_name, source=ts2.source,
  (ts2 / (1024 * 1024 *1024)) 
  )

sources.name: total cost
sources.query: aliasMetric((${cpu cost} [+] ${memory cost}), 'Total Cost per day ($)')

charts.description: The number of Available, Desired and Ready replicas per deployment.

sources.name: A
sources.query: lag(1m, count(align(60s, sum(collect(align(1m,ts(kubernetes.pod.cpu.${basis}, cluster="${cluster_name}")), align(1m,ts(kubernetes.pod.memory.${basis}, cluster="${cluster_name}"))), pod_name, namespace_name)).eq(0)))

sources.name: A
sources.query: collect(taggify(2, k8s-object, "clusters"), taggify(1, k8s-object, "nodes"), taggify(0, k8s-object, "containers"))

sources.name: CPU Usage
sources.query: lag(10m, aliasMetric(aliasSource(avg(ts("kubernetes.node.cpu.node_utilization", cluster="${cluster_name}" , cluster="${cluster_name}"), nodename, label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type,node_role, cluster), "{{nodename}}")*100, "CPU Usage (%)"))

sources.name: CPU Alloc
sources.query: round(lag(10m, aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(ts("kubernetes.node.cpu.node_allocatable", cluster="${cluster_name}" , cluster="${cluster_name}"), nodename, label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type,node_role, cluster), "{{nodename}}"), "Alloc CPU")/1000))

sources.name: Memory Usage
sources.query: lag(10m, aliasMetric(aliasSource(avg(ts("kubernetes.node.memory.working_set", cluster="${cluster_name}") / ts("kubernetes.node.memory.node_allocatable", cluster="${cluster_name}") * 100, nodename, label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type,node_role, cluster), "{{nodename}}"), "Memory Usage (%)"))

sources.name: Pod Count
sources.query: lag(10m, aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60s, ts("kubernetes.node.pod.count", cluster="${cluster_name}")), nodename, label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type,node_role, cluster), "{{nodename}}"), "Pod Count"))

sources.name: Actual # of Instances
sources.query: count(max(ts(kubernetes.node.uptime, cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}"), nodename, node_role, label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type ),label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type, node_role)

sources.name: CPU for Instances
sources.query: sum(max(ts("kubernetes.node.cpu.${basis}", cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}"), nodename)) / ${CPU Node Capacity}

sources.name: CPU Node Capacity
sources.query: avg((avg(ts("kubernetes.node.cpu.node_allocatable", cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}"), sources, nodename, node_role)) )

sources.name: Memory for Instances
sources.query: if(exists(ts("kubernetes.node.memory.${basis}", cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}")), sum(max(ts("kubernetes.node.memory.${basis}", cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}"), nodename)) / ${Memory Node Capacity}, sum(max(ts("kubernetes.node.memory.usage", cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}"), nodename)) / ${Memory Node Capacity})

sources.name: Memory Node Capacity
sources.query: avg((avg(ts("kubernetes.node.memory.node_allocatable", cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}"), sources, nodename, node_role)) )

sources.name: Actual # of Instances
sources.query: count(max(ts(kubernetes.node.uptime, cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}"), nodename, node_role, label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type ),label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type, node_role)

sources.name: Memory for Instances
sources.query: if (exists(ts("kubernetes.node.memory.${basis}", cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}")), sum(max(ts("kubernetes.node.memory.${basis}", cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}"), nodename)) / (${s_mem}*1024*1024*1024), sum(max(ts("kubernetes.node.memory.usage", cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}" and "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"="${instance-type}"), nodename)) / (${s_mem}*1024*1024*1024))

instance-type.queryValue: collect(max(ts(kubernetes.node.uptime, cluster="${cluster_name}" and node_role="${node_role}"), "label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type"), taggify(1, label.node.kubernetes.io/instance-type, "*"))
instance-type.label: Instance Type

charts.name: Request Rate
charts.description: Latest request rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Request Rate
charts.description: Average request rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Top Requests
charts.description: Requests that were made most frequently in the selected time window. Click a request to drill down to related traces.

charts.name: Errors
charts.description: Latest error rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Error (%)
charts.description: Average error rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Top Failed Requests
charts.description: Requests that failed most frequently in the selected time window. Click a request to drill down to related traces.

charts.name: Latency
charts.description: Latest latency in the selected time window.

charts.name: Latency
charts.description: Average, median and P95 latency in the selected time window.

charts.name: Slowest Requests (P95)
charts.description: Slowest requests in the selected time window. Click a request to drill down to related traces.

charts.name: Request Latency
charts.description: Request latency histogram. Click a histogram column to view traces related to that percentile.

sources.name: api-request-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(jersey.server.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), operationName)))))

sources.name: api-fail-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', default(0, msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(jersey.server.response.*.errors.count, ${all_filters}))), operationName))))))

sources.name: api-latency
sources.query: round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(jersey.server.response.*.total_time.count, ${all_filters}))), operationName)))) / round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(jersey.server.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), operationName))))

sectionFilter.query: ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and component="jersey-server")

charts.name: QueuedThreadPool.dw.job
charts.description: “Number of jobs queued waiting for a thread”. This metric you want as low as possible as you don’t want requests waiting to be served. You may get the occasional 1, but that is when the metric grabbed it’s value, during the miniscule amount of time a single job is in the queue, and it is nothing to worry about, as all requests have to be served from the queue. To put in perspective, taking the average over 24 hours of this metrics in a production service yielded 0.0015

charts.name: QueuedThreadPool.dw.size
charts.description: The number of threads currently in the pool”. These are the threads in the (Jetty) web server that are servicing requests.

charts.name: QueuedThreadPool.dw.utilization
charts.description: The number of threads currently being used in the pool (eg. how many threads currently in the pool are not idle).

sectionFilter.query: ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and component="dropwizard")

sources.name: api-fail-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', default(0, msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(AspNetCore.response.*.5*.cumulative.count or AspNetCore.response.*.4*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), AspNetCore.resource.action))))))

sources.name: api-latency
sources.query: round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(AspNetCore.response.*.total_time.count, ${all_filters}))), AspNetCore.resource.action)))) / round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(AspNetCore.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), AspNetCore.resource.action))))

sectionFilter.query: ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and component="AspNetCore")

sources.name: api-request-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(django.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), django.resource.func)))))

sources.name: api-fail-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', default(0, msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(django.response.*.5*.cumulative.count or django.response.*.4*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), django.resource.func))))))

sources.name: api-latency
sources.query: round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(django.response.*.total_time.count, ${all_filters}))), django.resource.func)))) / round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(django.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), django.resource.func))))

sectionFilter.query: ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and component="django")

sources.name: api-request-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(taggify(ts(grpc.client.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}), metric, grpcmethod, "^grpc\.client\.response\.(.*)\.([^\.]+)\.cumulative\.count$", "$1"))), grpcmethod)))))

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', default(0, msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(taggify(ts(grpc.client.response.*.errors.count, ${all_filters}), metric, grpcmethod, "^grpc\.client\.response\.(.*)\.errors\.count$", "$1"))), grpcmethod))))))

sources.name: api-latency
sources.query: round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(taggify(ts(grpc.client.response.*.total_time.count, ${all_filters}), metric, grpcmethod, "^grpc\.client\.response\.(.*)\.([^\.]+)\.total_time\.count$", "$1"))), grpcmethod)))) / round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(taggify(ts(grpc.client.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}), metric, grpcmethod, "^grpc\.client\.response\.(.*)\.([^\.]+)\.cumulative\.count$", "$1"))), grpcmethod))))

sectionFilter.query: ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and component="grpc-client")

sectionFilter.query: ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and component="grpc-server")

charts.name: CPU Use vs Limit for node ${cluster}:${nodename}
CPU Use vs Limit for node ${cluster}:${nodename}
Mem Use vs Limit for node ${cluster}:${nodename}
Mem Use vs Limit for node ${cluster}:${nodename}
File Use vs Limit for node ${cluster}:${nodename}
File Use vs Limit for node ${cluster}:${nodename}

valuesToReadableStrings.default: application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and span.kind?="${spanKind}"

valid-sources.value: sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and  source=${source}), sources)
valid-sources.label: valid-sources

valuesToReadableStrings.Label: sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and  source=${source}), sources)

valuesToReadableStrings.default: application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and source="${source}" and span.kind?="${spanKind}"

cluster.queryValue: sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and not "_synthetic"="true"), cluster)
cluster.label: cluster

source.queryValue: collect(sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and not "_synthetic"="true"),sources), aliasSource(1, "*"))
source.label: source

valuesToReadableStrings.default: application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and source="${source}"

spanKind.queryValue: collect(sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and not "_synthetic"="true"), "span.kind"), taggify(1, "span.kind", "*"))
spanKind.label: spanKind

shard.queryValue: collect(sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and not "_synthetic"="true"), shard), taggify(1, "shard", "*"))
shard.label: shard
